contacts.body: Adding your contacts makes it easy to send and request payments with your friends. Connecting does not send invites to your contacts.

inviteCode.title: Invite Code
inviteCode.body: If you were invited or received a payment, please copy and paste the invite code below.
inviteCode.label: Invite Code
inviteCode.nodeCodeInviteLink: Don’t have an invite code? Request one at <0>celo.org/app</0> or <1>continue without</1>
